document_data.name: ''Belabrantan Caparison of Warmth''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''Belabrantan caparison of warmth''''' was a [[magical item]] unique to [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Description: A Belabrantan caparison of warmth was a large cloth made from red [[silk]] and was covered in ornate patterns. Prominently displayed on the cloth was the heraldic symbol of [[Belabranta|House Belabranta]].
document_data.Powers: This magical item  was used by riders to keep themselves, and their steed, at a comfortable temperature while in either extremely cold or extremely hot climates. This effect was identical to the ''[[endure elements]]'' spell.
